activities: Accu-Image provides scanning and electronic document management services to multiple international companies.  This includes both automatic and manual processing of client documents, including human resources documents with sensitive personal information.  Accu-Image does not release any client data to outside parties, and we take rigorous security measures to prevent the distribution of sensitive client information.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a division of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
